item.title: Fortnite: Best Super Powers in Chapter 6 Season 3
item.description:
There are 8 pieces of Supernova Gear that players can acquire in Fortnite Chapter 6 Season 3: Super, and while they each offer players unique superpowers to enjoy in Battle Royale, not all of them will make players feel like the most powerful being on the island. The best superpowers in Fortnite will provide players with immense power that will see them claim Victory Royale with ease, so for the players out there who want to enjoy superpowers, while Chapter 6 Season 3 still runs, they will want to check out the ranking below of which Supernova Gear is worth using for power.

8 Surf Cube

An Opportunity to Surf on Air and Water

  • How to Get: Purchased from Lightrider at Shiny Shafts for 300 Gold

The Surf Cube is a useful utility item that allows players to jump on a constructed surfboard to skate on roads, air, and water. There's no power in the Surf Cube that players can use for fighting, but it's a great tool for escaping fights, allowing players to soar through the air with fairly decent speed so that they can get away from hostilities. While the Surf Cube is nice to use, it really doesn't offer much protection, and players will have to dodge and weave in the air if they are to use it for its only function, which is to escape.

7 Tracking Visor

Track Enemy Footprints and Scan Them to See Through Walls

  • How to Get: Purchased from Killswitch at Foxy Floodgate for 200 Gold

The Tracking Visor allows players to activate a scan across the battlefield, providing an 80-meter radius that can reveal anyone within the vicinity. Anyone caught in the area is revealed with a bold red highlight, even if they're hiding behind walls. This lasts for 8 seconds, and players can scan the area again every 25 seconds. Not only can the Tracking Visor track enemies, but it can also see footprints, ensuring that players know where their next prey is heading. The biggest problem with the Tracking Visor is that it's only good for revealing nearby enemies, and it's not good for actually causing damage unless players want something to stop them from being flanked or surprised.

6 Bass Boost

Fire Waves of Energy to Launch into the Air and Smash Structures

  • How to Get: Purchased from Synthwave, west of Resistance Base for 300 Gold

Another useful utility item that will get players where they need to go is the Bass Boost, a fun item that will fire waves of energy that can be used to either impulse players away, destroy structures, or launch you into the air without the fear of fall damage. While the Bass Boost is useful for getting enemies out of their cowering structures, it's also greatly effective in removing yourself from the fight, as players have a few charges that they can use to not only launch themselves into the air but to propel themselves forward or backward to escape a deadly scenario and live to tell the tale.

5 Myst Form

Become Temporarily Invulnerable and Fly

  • How to Get: Purchased at Academy Tech Labs or by destroying Spires

Myst Form is another utility item where players can use it for one purpose: escapism. The Myst Form ability will see players enter into an invulnerable flight mode for 4 seconds, with a cooldown of 20 seconds. These 4 seconds provide players with the inability to avoid getting hurt, and they can fly up and go far with great speed to avoid enemies, or get closer towards them. However, the Myst Form is still just a utility item with one use, and won't be the catalyst for success.

4 Myst Gauntlets

Fire a Deadly Barrage of Ravens

  • How to Get: Purchased from Morgan Myst at the Supernova Academy for 300 Gold

The Myst Gauntlets will see players fire a barrage of ravens from their palms, and each raven will hit for around 12 damage. With so many ravens being sent out at once, players will have an intense DPS to use on their enemies. The Myst Gauntlets might have high DPS, but the damage isn't the most satisfying unless players are fighting a horde of multiple foes, since the damage has a great spread thanks to their cone-shaped blast radius.

3 Killswitch Revolvers

Enter a Slow-Mo Hangtime and Fire Double Revolvers

  • How to Get: Purchased from Supernova Academy Vaults or found in Supernova Academy Stands

The Killswitch Revolvers are a dual-wield weapon, allowing players to carry two revolvers at once so that they can double the trouble and damage against their enemies. The Killswitch Revolvers are a fun weapon to use in the meta, with fairly decent damage that's only further aided by the fact that when you jump while in midair, you will enter a slow-motion mode. In this slow-mo, players will have superior accuracy and a height advantage that allows them to look as cool as Neo from The Matrix or Max Payne from Max Payne as they experience their own bullet time.

2 Storm Beast's Pom Poms

Transform Into a Deadly Storm Monster

  • How to Get: Purchased from Haylee Skye at Pumped Power for 400 Gold

An item so powerful, it's had to be removed not once, but twice. The Storm Beast's Pom Poms might seem like a cute cheerleading accessory, but they actually transform the player into a deadly and hungry storm beast. The storm beast transformation is quick and provides players with plenty of health to tank shots from enemies. Their sprint is faster, their jump is long distance and spammable, and the attacks from each powerful move will certainly destroy those whom the storm beast hunts, allowing for this superpower to go unmatched in most matches.

1 Kryptonian Form

Become Superman to Fly, Punch, and Heat Vision to Victory

  • How to Get: Interact with the Superman emblem that appears on the map after around 2 minutes

The Kryptonian Form became active on July 11, 2025, providing players with an opportunity to turn into Superman himself. This ability was truly unique, and like Godzilla in previous seasons, only one player would be able to claim this prize. It's a first-come, first-served situation, where players can race to the center of the map for the Kryptonian Form. What awaits is a transformation into Superman, where players can fly through the sky at quickened speeds to reach their enemies, and use heat vision and punches to destroy anyone in their path. Each elimination is more health for Superman, meaning the most effective players can grab this Superman ability and win the game with the utmost ease.

item.title: Rumor: Battlefield 6's Battle Royale Mode Might Not Be Available at Launch
item.description:
A new rumor from a credible source claims that EA won't be launching a Battle Royale mode alongside Battlefield 6 , as it will arrive "months" after the base game is launched. While there have been plenty of rumors surrounding a potential Battle Royale mode for Battlefield 6 , it looks like the studio is still hard at work on its development, as new information suggests fans may even have to wait until early next year to play it.

Some lucky Battlefield fans have been going hands-on with the next entry in the franchise via closed playtests throughout the year, but those who weren't so lucky were finally given their very first look at Battlefield 6 with an official reveal trailer on July 24. The trailer focused solely on the shooter's single-player campaign, complete with some epic gunfights, explosions, and more. Those looking to see even more of the next Battlefield game will have to wait until July 31, as EA has confirmed a multiplayer reveal for Battlefield 6 will take place then.

With Battle Royale games being all the rage in recent years, it's no surprise that there have been rumors claiming Battlefield 6 will also have a Battle Royale mode. However, the shooter may be following in the footsteps of Call of Duty and launching the mode "months" after the base game's release. According to Kick streamer RivaLxfactor, two inside sources have told the content creator that the mode will be free-to-play but "won't come out till months after the base game." However, the streamer did note that plans could change behind the scenes between now and its release.

Battlefield 6's Battle Royale Mode May Come 'Months After' Release

EA has yet to confirm when the next entry in the series will be released, but there are rumors that claim Battlefield 6 will launch in October. If these rumors prove to be true, the shooter's Battle Royale mode might not be available until the Holiday season or even early next year. However, this isn't unheard of. Call of Duty: Warzone is now one of the biggest Battle Royale titles around, but it didn't come until five months after the release of 2019's Modern Warfare . Whether or not EA feels delaying the release of Battlefield 6 's Battle Royale mode is good for marketing, or if it's just simply not ready for release yet, remains unknown.

Even without confirmation of a Battle Royale mode, fans are already extremely hyped for the next Battlefield game. In just one hour after its release, the reveal trailer for Battlefield 6 racked up more likes than Black Ops 7 's, which has been available online for well over a month. Yesterday's trailer managed to pull in almost 200,000 likes in its first hour, while the next Call of Duty game's first trailer has only accumulated 140,000 likes in over a month.

item.title: 5 Best Open-World Games That Are Spiritual Successors, Ranked
item.description:
Players love the idea of old and respected video games receiving spiritual successors that carry forward their vision with a fresh coat of paint. While the optimal solution is for these classic titles to become long-running series, this is a decent compromise, especially once players realize that the new IP can be largely original while retaining the special bits that made the original franchise such a blast.

Some of the best open-world games players can get their hands on now owe their success to the titles that inspired them. The new games feature quality storytelling and worldbuilding of their own while allowing players to witness a perfection or evolution of gameplay tropes from another notable video game that had such a major impact in the gaming industry that they've shaped wildly successful spiritual successors.

5 Assassin's Creed

Born From The Ashes Of The Prince Of Persia Series

5 Images
5 Images
Assassin's Creed
7.7 /10
Released
November 14, 2007

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ Due To Blood, Strong Language, Violence
Powered by

There's no denying that Prince of Persia is one of the best platforming franchises of all time, with The Sands of Time trilogy having all the ingredients for an incredible video game experience. However, the series lost a ton of its momentum over time, to the point where Ubisoft wanted to do something different with this series. An idea thrown into the mix was that players wouldn't control the Prince himself, but a bodyguard or someone else in a similar position who would protect their liege.

This idea morphed into something special, leading to the creation of the first Assassin's Creed game. While the sandbox design in this series would need some improvement, the unique setting, compelling story, fun traversal, and a great mix of combat & stealth ensured that Altair's adventures would mark the beginning of something special.

4 Xenoblade Chronicles X

Despite Being From The Same Series, This Title Is Structured As A Spiritual Successor

Xenoblade Chronicles X
9 /10
7.0 /10
Released
December 4, 2015

WHERE TO PLAY

PHYSICAL

ESRB
T For Teen Due To Animated Blood, Language, Suggestive Themes, Use of Alcohol, Violence
Powered by

Despite what its name suggests, Xenoblade Chronicles X doesn't have a major connection to other entries in the series. Instead, it's styled as a spiritual successor of sorts to the Xenoblade Chronicles series, which is odd but not something fans will dwell upon.

It helps that Xenoblade Chronicles X is bursting with excellence, allowing fans to drop into this title without a second thought, even if they aren't familiar with other games in the series. It boasts a unique edge and what many fans consider to be the best open world in the series, which is hefty praise indeed.

3 Sleeping Dogs

A True Crime: Hong Kong Game That Turned Into This Stellar Open-World Adventure

Sleeping Dogs
9 /10
10
8.3 /10
Released
August 14, 2012

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ due to Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Sexual Content, Strong Language, Use of Drugs
Powered by

With the popularity of GTA skyrocketing, other developers wanted a piece of that sandbox pie. This led to the rise of Grand Theft Auto clones, with True Crime being one of the more notable titles to experiment with this sandbox. True Crime: Streets of LA was a fun title that was worth checking out for fans of Rockstar's crime series, but the same can't be said for True Crime: New York City , which was rushed out and littered with bugs that took away from a game that already lacked innovation.

Another True Crime game was stated to be set in Hong Kong, but poor critical and commercial performance meant that the IP was shelved after just two releases. However, from the ashes of this Hong Kong crime game rose Sleeping Dogs , an incredible open-world adventure with fun combat and a surprisingly great story that is hailed by many as one of the best action-packed open-world games fans can get their hands on.

2 Shadow Of The Colossus

Both A Spiritual Successor And A Sequel To Ico

Shadow of the Colossus (2018)
8.9 /10
Released
February 6, 2018

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T For Teen due to Blood, Violence
Powered by

It's a shame that not many people are aware of Ico, with players more familiar with titles like Shadow of the Colossus and The Last Guardian instead. In the case of the former, the title serves as both a spiritual and actual successor to Ico, featuring a unique story where players control a hero who must take out sixteen colossi to revive the love of his life.

In doing so, he makes a deal with a vengeful entity named Dormin, who is released after the colossi are taken out. However, this malicious being is sealed in the nick of time, but Wander himself has regressed to become a child as he's held in the arms of the woman he once loved at the end of the game.

1 Elden Ring

Technicalities Make This A Spiritual Successor To Dark Souls, Demon's Souls, And King's Field

6 Images
6 Images
Elden Ring
10 /10
67
9.1 /10
Released
February 25, 2022

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Language, Suggestive Themes, Violence
Powered by

Elden Ring is in a rather odd position when it comes to spiritual successors. The bedrock of this game's action RPG formula existed all the way back in King's Field , one of FromSoftware's most underrated series that only gained notoriety after Dark Souls became a major hit. Elements of King's Field were adapted in Demon's Souls , with Dark Souls serving as a spiritual successor of sorts to this PS3 exclusive.

Finally, Elden Ring carries over a ton of elements from the Dark Souls trilogy while having some original elements of its own. This chain of spiritual succession makes it clear that FromSoftware was well-versed with the formula when they made Elden Ring , which is just one of the many reasons why this title broke everyone's minds and became one of the greatest open-world video games ever made.

item.title: Wuchang Fallen Feathers: Best PC Settings to Improve Performance
item.description:
Wuchang Fallen Feathers is based on the newest version of Unreal Engine 5, which breathes life into the land of Shu during the late Ming Dynasty. Even though these visuals are great, they're taking a toll on PCs as players have been experiencing performance issues with the game. From in-game stuttering to low FPS, there are a host of issues that are caused by the game's bad performance. However, this guide aims to list down the best settings that you can try in the graphics menu to optimize the game's performance.

Best Graphics Settings for Wuchang Fallen Feathers on PC

Players can tweak quite a lot of graphics settings for Wuchang Fallen Feathers to adjust the performance of the game according to their PC. These settings are mainly divided into two sections : Graphics Settings and Advanced Graphics Settings. While the former contains mainly the display settings that will tweak how the game functions on your hardware, the latter will determine the quality of the visuals.

So, without any further ado, let's take a deep dive into the best settings for Wuchang Fallen Feathers and make them optimized for your PC.

Type

Setting Name

Best Preset

Notes

Graphics Settings

Display

Select your primary monitor here.

-

HDR

On

You can try enabling HDR on a capable display to enhance the dynamic range of visuals. However, if configured incorrectly, this can make the picture overblown with brightness.

Display Mode

Borderless Windowed

There isn't a fullscreen option, but Borderless Windowed does a good job of maintaining performance.

Resolution

Native

Select your native resolution here for the best clarity. It's recommended to use an upscaler instead of opting to run the game at a lower resolution.

Lock FPS

Unlimited

-

V-Sync

Off

Will increase input latency slightly.

Low Latency Mode

Enable if available

-

Overall Quality

Custom

We'll be tuning in all the visual settings for Wuchang Fallen Feathers , so no need to use a static preset.

Motion Blur

Off

No need to turn on Motion Blur as it tampers with environmental awareness during combat or exploration. However, it's a personal choice, so feel free to experience it for yourself.

Depth of Field

High

Adds a Bokeh effect when focusing on objects.

Advanced Graphics Settings

Oversampling Resolution

55%

Determines the resolution for the AI upscaler to target. 55% is a good performance target.

Super-Resolution Oversampling

DLSS

DLSS will be the go-to option for Nvidia RTX GPUs. Since there's a lack of FSR support at the time of writing, others will have to use TSR, which is a demanding option.

Frame Generation

On

If your GPU supports Frame Generation, make sure to use it to increase FPS.

Sharpening

Personal Preference

-

Post-Processing

High

Handles volumetric effects in-game.

Shadow Quality

Mid

Shadows are one of the most taxing visual settings. Mid is a sweet spot between performance and graphical quality.

Effects Quality

High

Mostly handles in-game effects production like explosions and enemy attacks. Try decreasing it if you're experiencing FPS drops in crowded areas.

Viewing Distance

High

Using the high option may decrease performance, but it'll significantly reduce texture pop-in issues.

Texture Quality

GPU VRAM Dependent

6GB : Low, 8GB : Mid, 12GB+ : High

Vegetation Quality

Mid

Outdoor areas in Wuchang Fallen Feathers have dense vegetation in the environment which may reduce performance. Mid is the way to go.

Volumetric Fog

Low

Another taxing setting that will reduce your FPS in foggy sections of the game. Try increasing it if you have performance to spare after the other optimization, as it looks amazing.

Global Illumination

Mid

Another highly taxing setting that directly handles lighting in various scenes. Mid seems to be the best option here.

Ambient Occlusion

High

It does not tax FPS much, and low take the depth out of dimly lit indoor scenes.

These were all the best settings for Wuchang Fallen Feathers on PC that you should use to optimize its performance. After testing the settings above on a PC with an i9-14900HX CPU, Nvidia RTX 4080 GPU, and 32GB of RAM, the performance averaged around 80-90 FPS . However, turning off DLSS and Frame Generation lowered the performance to the 55-60 FPS range, which is still an improvement over the default high-ultra settings preset.

8 Images

item.title: Elden Ring Movie Reportedly in Talks With Alien Star and Fans Think Theyve Found Melina
item.description:
Another day brings a new casting rumor attached to the anticipated Elden Ring movie, as one insider claims a rising star from the Alien franchise may be joining the project, and fans are betting its for the role of Melina. Elden Ring is a 2022 action RPG developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco, with director Hidetaka Miyazaki and Game of Thrones writer George R.R. Martin in charge of the worldbuilding. The base game received a popular Shadow of the Erdtree expansion in 2024 and the Elden Ring Nightreign spin-off multiplayer this year, meaning theres no short supply of source material for the film to adapt.

Three years after the games release, production company A24 confirmed a film adaptation was in the works, with Ex Machina and Annihilation director Alex Garland at the helm. Martin shared his candid opinion on the adaptation shortly after the announcement, and the writer will serve as producer to oversee the story and lore. Considering the production is already underway with casting, theres a good chance filming could begin in 2026, potentially targeting a 2027 release date. Garland has completed work on penning 28 Years Later: The Bone Temple and currently has no other projects in development, besides Elden Ring .

Elden Ring Movie Reportedly Eyeing Alien: Romulus' Cailee Spaeny

Posted on Twitter, insider Jeff Sneider reported that Alien : Romulus star Cailee Spaeny was in talks to reunite with Garland in the Elden Ring movie, after the two worked together on 2024s Civil War . No further details were given, but fans took the news and ran with it, predicting Spaeny could potentially be playing Melina. Images of the character appeared under the report on social media, with a few accounts commenting, I think we all know who she is playing. Others spammed "Melina" in the comments, with an alternative choice being Ranni the Witch. Spaenys rumored addition joins unconfirmed whispers of Heartstopper star Kit Connor joining the project in a lead role, which would reunite the actor with Garland after working on this years Warfare . Additionally, the Elden Ring movie was potentially eyeing a James Bond star to join the ensemble in an undisclosed role.

Spaeny started her career voicing Rain in Behaviour Interactives asymmetrical horror game Dead by Daylight , before appearing in the television miniseries Devs (which was also created by Garland) and Mare of Easttown , as well as the movies The Craft: Legacy and Priscilla . Despite Bella Ramsey doing a great job evolving Ellie in HBOs The Last of Us , fans of the Naughty Dog game series have always eyed Spaeny for the role, since the actor bears a striking resemblance to the protagonist.

While gamers wait for A24 to either confirm or deny Spaenys role, Elden Ring fans have other actors in mind for Melina. The character is an important figure in the games lore, but rather mysterious, only appearing at Sites of Grace to assist the Tarnished on their quest to become the Elden Lord. Popular fan casts for Melina include Zoe Kravitz, who played Selina Kyle in 2022s The Batman , and Game of Thrones actors Nathalie Emmanuel and Rose Leslie, who played Missandei and Ygritte, respectively.
